internal.content:
--- export const Title = () => ( Workshop Agenda
); --- ## Turbonomic Workshop Agenda: - Introduction --------------------------------------------------------------------- 10 Minutes - Product Overview --------------------------------------------------------------- 20 Minutes - Product Demo ------------------------------------------------------------------- 15 Minutes - Lab Environment Overview ----------------------------------------------------- 10 Minutes - Access Validation to Lab Environment ----------------------------------------- 10 Minutes - ARM Lab ------------------------------------------------------------------------ 120 Minutes - Lab 1 - Global view of the applications and their infrastructure dependencies - Lab 2 - Drilling into the RobotShop application - Lab 3 - Performance Recommendations - Lab 4 - Automating Actions - Summary ARM - Lunch Break ---------------------------------------------------------------------- 60 Minutes - Pricing and Deployment options ------------------------------------------------ 20 Minutes - FinOps Lab ---------------------------------------------------------------------- 120 Minutes - Lab 1 - Visualizing your public cloud deployments - Lab 2 - Getting recommendations for savings opportunities - Lab 3 - Rightsizing compute instances - Lab 4 - Optimizing storage resources - Lab 5 - Leveraging cloud provider discounts - Summary FinOps - Turbo Competition ------------------------------------------------------------- 10 Minutes - Product Roadmap -------------------------------------------------------------- 10 Minutes - Turbonomic demo using Demo-Easel ----------------------------------------- 10 Minutes - Scavenger Hunt with Giveaways ----------------------------------------------- 10 Minutes - Open Discussion & Closing ----------------------------------------------------- 10 Minutes

--- export const Title = () => ( Workshop Agenda
); --- ## Turbonomic Workshop Agenda: - Introduction --------------------------------------------------------------------- 10 Minutes - Product Overview --------------------------------------------------------------- 20 Minutes - Product Demo ------------------------------------------------------------------- 15 Minutes - Lab Environment Overview ----------------------------------------------------- 10 Minutes - Access Validation to Lab Environment ----------------------------------------- 10 Minutes - ARM Lab ------------------------------------------------------------------------ 120 Minutes - Lab 1 - Global view of the applications and their infrastructure dependencies - Lab 2 - Drilling into the RobotShop application - Lab 3 - Performance Recommendations - Lab 4 - Automating Actions - Summary ARM - Lunch Break ---------------------------------------------------------------------- 60 Minutes - Pricing and Deployment options ------------------------------------------------ 20 Minutes - FinOps Lab ---------------------------------------------------------------------- 120 Minutes - Lab 1 - Visualizing your public cloud deployments - Lab 2 - Getting recommendations for savings opportunities - Lab 3 - Rightsizing compute instances - Lab 4 - Optimizing storage resources - Lab 5 - Leveraging cloud provider discounts - Summary FinOps - Turbo Competition ------------------------------------------------------------- 10 Minutes - Product Roadmap -------------------------------------------------------------- 10 Minutes - Turbonomic demo using Demo-Easel ----------------------------------------- 10 Minutes - Scavenger Hunt with Giveaways ----------------------------------------------- 10 Minutes - Open Discussion & Closing ----------------------------------------------------- 10 Minutes
